title: What technologies have changed the music industry most profoundly in the last 20 years? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music industry has come a long way from vinyl records to digital music.  Above is how new music technology moved from records to digital files from 1975–2007. Vinyl RecordsCassettesCDDigital music. Every industry has a shift along with the music industry.The above is timeline for each product or service related technology from cassettes to Virtual reality.

Digital downloading has massively changed the business, including the artist’s ability to be properly compensated by virtue of people sharing music instead of buying it. Roseanne Cash makes some very good points about this.
